title: When do the angels stop recording attendance for Friday prayer #Assim #assimalhakeem assim al hakeem
transcript: um during um Friday prayers and the the comes around he says Salam then the you know makes calls the then the begins so my question now is um what um specific time does do the Angels you know stop you recording the people came is it when the sayam or after you know or when he begins the you know after no the moment the Imam enters the Masjid they close their books so immediately once he enters the Masid and goes to the pulpit and says it's done and over with
